description: Updates the service network and VPC association. If you add a security group to the service network and VPC association, the association must continue to have at least one security group. You can add or edit security groups at any time. However, to remove all security groups, you must first delete the association and then recreate it without security groups.

parameters.name: securityGroupIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the security groups. (string) ---

parameters.name: serviceNetworkVpcAssociationIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or ARN of the association.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the association.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The account that created the association.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the security groups.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status. You can retry the operation if the status is DELETE_FAILED. However, if you retry it while the status is DELETE_IN_PROGRESS, there is no change in the status.
